Review Text: We selected the newly revitalised Bali Beach Hotel for our family getaway in December, and it proved to be an inspired choice. The restoration of this icon is truly impressive, the hardware exudes a sense of grandeur, and the location in Sanur is simply unbeatable. The Olympic-sized pool and the engaging Kids Club were absolute highlights for my son, providing endless entertainment. We also delighted in the two on-site dining venues and took full advantage of the generous 1-for-1 promotion at the spa, which was a wonderful touch for in-house guests. Our room was a sanctuary of modern luxury, boasting excellent design and build quality. The view from the balcony was, in a word, priceless‚Äîa breathtaking panorama that I understand graces every room in the hotel. That said, there were two minor details that I felt did not quite align with the otherwise opulent standards of the property: the refrigerator struggled to maintain a cool temperature, and the bath linens felt slightly past their prime. Aside from these small points of feedback, the accommodation was superb. However, what truly sets this hotel apart is its software‚Äîthe service. The hospitality we received was nothing short of flawless, epitomized by Mr. Eka Subawa. He became far more than a staff member to us; he was our unofficial, personalized concierge, ensuring our stay was perfect even on his days off. His level of care, dedication, and genuine warmth is a rare find and truly priceless. Finally, the location is perfection. The beachfront promenade offers a vibrant array of activities and dining options should you wish to venture out. It strikes a magnificent balance; avoiding the manic energy of Kuta and the pretension of Canggu. Sanur, and specifically the Bali Beach Hotel, offers the perfect equilibrium for anyone seeking the very best of Bali.

Impressive even on arrival, with a beautifully constructed hallway leading to the spacious and relaxing main lobby. Excellent service, comfortable rooms, and a great view. Huge clean swimming pool and a very usable gym compared to typical hotels. Very close to the Bali Beach Convention Center and with easy access to the beachside street walk, but just far enough from the nearby restaurants to be very quiet and pleasant. The breakfast buffet had a satisfactory variety of well-prepared local and international dishes. All for a price that is much cheaper than what I am used to in other countries. Definitely worthy of consideration for a leisurely stress-free vacation.

Overall, the hotel had a calm, cozy atmosphere and all the staff were very kind, so we really enjoyed our stay. The breakfast was a bit disappointing, to be honest‚Ä¶ but everything else made up for it. What stood out the most was the kids club ‚Äî our children absolutely loved it. They had such a great time that even now they keep asking for Miss Astri , Ayu, desak and laksmi ü•π We‚Äôre staying at a different hotel right now, but they keep saying they want to go back to Bali Beach Hotel, haha. Thank you so much for taking such great care of our kids. We truly appreciate it! üíõ

Our most memorable experience was of course the Balinese hotel staff, incredibly helpful and friendly. The path from the hotel to Bali Icon shopping Mall is an easy 10minute walk. Our room was exactly what we hoped for clean, spacious, and incredibly comfortable, with thoughtful touches that made us feel right at home. This is an old hotel that now presents a fresh new look after renovation. The lobby is luxurious and grand. The arrangement of Balinese goddesses along the entrance hallway creates a unique and elegant interior. The room is quite spacious and comfortable. The breakfast menu is varied, but the taste is rather disappointing. The best part of this hotel is that all rooms face the beach. Sanur, known for its calm and clean beach, creates a very pleasant stay atmosphere. The hotel landscape is fairly large and well-maintained. In my opinion, for a five-star hotel, its main shortcoming is the lack of facilities. Only the sunrise yoga is free‚Äîother activities come at an additional cost. There are also no performances such as Balinese dance, gamelan music, or other cultural shows that are typically offered in five-star hotels. Along the beach, there are many charming caf√©s, restaurants, local shops, bars, and more‚Äîall within walking distance. One of the hotel‚Äôs standout qualities is its friendly staff, who are always greeting and helpful. They do not discriminate between local and foreign tourists. As a local tourist, I find this a major plus, especially since many places in Bali tend to prioritize foreign guests and overlook locals. Good job, Bali Beach Hotel!

Incredible entrance. Perfect place to stay in Sanur. Could choose to stay nestled away or go down the beach to interact with shops, malls, and great restaurants. Absolutely loved our stay here. Perfect place to get down in gear. I would come back based on the breakfast alone. Lots of options both regarding food and drinks. Still thinking about. A huge newly renovated pool area was also very wonderful. I enjoyed a free yoga class one morning which was perfect.

Maybe our expectations were too high and based on the reviews of others perhaps I am being too harsh but unfortunately our experience was not that of a 5 star hotel. Check in was too long and unnecessarily procedural and we felt like we were waiting around too long. The room was lovely and the view amazing especially waking up to the sunrise and the sound of the waves. The pool is nice however access could be challenging for those with reduced mobility. There is no shade in the pool until the afternoon. There are not enough day beds for the amount of guests. This is also the case for the day beds on the beach. They seemed forgotten and very old. There isn‚Äôt anywhere beachside to chill out or just relax. The lounge area is unused as there is no view of the beach. Some comfortable lounge chairs would be a benefit to the beachside. We had to go to other venues to spend the day relaxing and enjoying food which was fine by us. There are three lifts (the slowest I have ever been on) and when one was being maintained we waited nearly 15mins for a lift. Walking along the foreshore at night was also challenging with the path lights being out and no security. Having to pass by the old abandoned hotel next door and being harassed by young louts was not an enjoyable experience. We only ordered food once from the pool area and were so disappointed with it we chose to eat elsewhere for the remainder of our stay. We mentioned our issues with the food and the drinks were replaced but they were no better. Sadly what should have been a special treat was a disappointment. The hotels focus is on style and not function.

WOW!!! Tidak menyangka akan sepuas ini di Bali Beach Hotel Sanur setelah renovasi hotelnya! Ini kunjungan saya kedua ke sini, tapi yang pertama setelah direnovasi dan berganti nama, dan sangat impressed!!! 7 tahun lalu saya berkunjung ke sini masih Inna Grand Bali Beach kalau tidak salah namanya, dan mohon maaf sekali sudah terasa tua dan kurang perawatan. Tetapi setelah dibuka lagi dengan nama baru pasca renovasi namanya Bali Beach Hotel, wow pengalaman saya sangat memuaskan! Bangunan gedungnya masih sama, yaitu bangunan paling besar dan tinggi di Bali. Tetapi setelah renovasi dan touch up sana dan sini, tidak terasa bahwa bangunan ini adalah bangunan yang sudah lama. Kamar sangat lega, kasur, sofa, kursi, semua nyaman. Kamar mandi juga sangat bagus, kayaknya sudah tidak ada sisa dari hotel lamanya di kamar mandi. Balkon kamar wowww langsung menatap laut dan Pulau Penida di seberang sana. Menyejukkan mata sekali dan setiap pagi disambut matahari terbit yang sangat indah. Fasilitas hotel untuk breakfast sudah cukup komplit, pelayanan sangat ramah. Kami selalu dapat duduk walaupun kami ke sana saat peak season libur Lebaran. Kesimpulan: kalau ke bali dan berniat untuk nyantai dan menikmati sunrise di pantai, hotel ini cocok banget, suasana bali dan tenangnya dapet banget, asalkan kalian siap dengan pelayan yang sudah berusia lanjut dan tidak sigap serta kebersihan kamar yang kurang. Score *6/10
Overlooking Sanur beach, with jogging track down the beach. The atmosphere of the resort rooms is very romantic. Plus technology updates in hotel facilities and resort rooms

1. Kondisi kamar kekurangan colokan. hanya terdapat dua colokan saja dan semua jauh dari kasur. 2. kondisi AC yg pengaturannya rumit dan tidak familiar 3. pintu yg usang dan berdebu. kurangnya maintenance 4. salah satu lampu kamar mati 5. lambatnya proses room service. pesan pukul 20.00 datang pukul 22.30 6. ketidakramahan staff terhadap tamu lokal 7. toilet menunggu lama untuk flushing. 8. bangunan sudah tua, banyak kayu2 yg sudah dimakan rayap dan kotor. mohon dipugar atau di maintenance. 9. makanan yg dipesan lama datang dan tidak hangat. 10. pesan king size tapi dapatnya double bed yg disatukan.

Kondisi kamar perlu perbaikan aircon tidak terlalu dingin tapi ada balcony yang bagus menghadap pantai lokasi strategis apalagi kalau perlu naek ferry ke nusa peninda biaya titip koper overnight 50rb per piece

It's the only high hotel in the area. I was in the 9th floor and the view is spectacular. Very clean, comfortable bed with good pillows and good service from the staff. Pool would need more cleanup and breakfast is a buffet. It's alright and simple. There was a lot of tiny spider everywhere. A bit away from the crowd. Overall I recommend as it is very nice.

People absolutely friendly. The hotel tower side it is old and need a big maintaining. We loved the location, if we back to Bali and choose to stay here, we would rather stay at the cottages or garden sides of the hotel. As it is much more quite n relaxing. The tower lots of happening from wedding, graduation and tour group or very noise laud Chinese!

The beds are comfortable here and the rooms were clean. Think we stayed in the older part of the hotel, and the bathroom and decor needs to be updated but it was clean and comfortable. The beach wad ok with lots of lounge chairs provided. Very nice pool and a kiddie pool too. There are 2 pools we only used one. Kids enjoyed the giant chess sets and lots of green area.

Sekuriti di situ menyebalkan banget, tgl 26kemaren sy ada temu janji sm kenalan yg ada di resolt grand ine, di pos pertama ya wajar lah kalau sy di mintain identitas, sy sdh ksh dan sy di ijinin masuk, di pertengahan sy masuk ke resepsionis, di situ sy blg tujuan sy mmg di layani dgn baik tp aneh nya bikin gedeg sj, kunci motor sy di suruh serahkan di resepsionis/di suruh simpan di sana sm mas2 yg jaga di situ, trs trang sy tolak dong, kunci motor , aneh banget, akhirnya sy lanjut ke tujuan di resort bagian blkg, di situ ketemu sekuriti lagi, sdh sy blg tujuan sy, malah di persulit mau masuk, akhirnya sy minta di jemput sm mbak yg mau sy temui, sekuriti nya menyebalkan

Due to location in a their own complex, we were greeted by somewhat a confusing security guard. He kept asking whether we stay in resort or not despite what we said about our reservation. It's like he doesn't want any guest whatsoever. Awful interaction. The room itself wasn't bad, just typical old school hotel type. They provided towels, but were some stains on them. Good thing I brought my own. The air conditioner wasn't cold, I assume because it was an old type. Kinda uncomfortable to sleep in. Overall good, just unpleasant security check before even come into the complex.

It has a massive pool with shade and the place is very quiet, great to go to if you truly want to veg out and relax. Where it needs improving is what they call accessible bathrooms - they really aren't. The rooms also look aged and a little run down, though for $25 a night twin share, it ain't a bad place to stay.

Hotel yang sangat nyaman. Semua staff hotel ramah banget. Gampang check in. Jam 10 pagi sudah boleh masuk kamar. Tidak harus nunggu lama-lama.. Kebetulan kami di kamar yang viewnya langsung ke pantai Sanur. Udaranya sejuk sekali. Ada view Chapel yang cantiikk banget. Instagramable banget!! Kamarnya luas, bersih, ada bathtub juga. Ada 2 kolam renang beda tempat. Salah satunya banyak pepohonan. Nyaman banget buat santai. Aman juga walaupun di tinggal lewat pintu belakang tanpa di kunci..

The locations is wonderful. From your room, you can just take a short stroll to the beach. It is perfect for people who likes to wake up in the morning to watch sunset or just be near the beach. The service is on point. They responded to telephone calls with only 1-2 minutes delay. The room cleaning service is also great and fast, almost perfect. There are 2 types of room, the room in a building or the room in a cottage or villa. I rented the one that's in a villa and it's awesome. You get this feeling of being submerged in nature. I highly recommend this hotel to the beach lovers and travelers.

Hotel bintang lima yang memiliki harga terjangkau dengan fasilitas yg cukup baik. Waktu tahun baru 2018/2019 saya sekeluarga menginap disana 4 hari. Pelayanan dari staf sangat ramah dan membantu. Untuk sarapan standar cuma bakerynya enak. Hati hati dibelakang hotel itu pantai sanur langsung banyak anjing berkeliaran. Kemarin orang tua saya sempat digigit anjing. Syukurlah staf dengan cepat tanggap membantu kami. Saya puas menginap disini üíù Selain hotel disini juga ada cottages dan bungalo jika ingin lebih private..

Place is opening back up after serving as a quarantine spot. The pools are still in need of repairs and cleaning. I'm sure there will be many happy guests served here in the future. The grounds are expansive and the beach access is wide open.

Area hotel sangat luas banyak view menarik untuk selfie. Pelayanan disini sangat baik dan cepat. Petugas hotel ramah dan sopan. Kamar bersih walau bnyk property yg lama namun ttp terawat dengan baik. Suasana nyaman. Menu makanan rasa enak untuk kelas bintang **** menurut saya hotel ini recomended. Saya akan merekomendasikan sahabat dan kerabat jika mengunjungi Bali khususnya yg berkunjung ke kota Denpasar

Hotelnya asri dan sejuk. Lahannya sangat luas dan terbuka. Cocok buat menginap bersama keluarga. Pelayanan hotel juga ramah juga kolam renangnya sangat bagus. Saya setiap kali berkunjung ke pulau dewata bali selalu pilihan hotel di denpasar jatuh ke Inna Bali. Karena tempatnya yang berdekatan dengan pantai sanur. Juga kalo memilih kamar yang tingkat kita bisa melihat view pantai sanur keseluruhan. Untuk breakfastnya sangat bervariasi untuk indonesia maupun turis mancanegara. Pernah satu waktu juga bertepatan dengan hari penting. Tiba2 ada surprise dari karyawan hotel yaitu santa clause. Dan memberi permen kepada anak2.... kalo kalian datang ke Bali bersama keluarga saya sarankam anda menginap di hotel ini.. worth it lah üòä

This place is HUGE. It's kind of old style but we did not mind this. This massive complex was fun to explore. It has a deserted feel, rather than throbbing with life, which we also did not mind. The room had a thick and effectively sound proof glass door out to the balcony, and the sunrise view was brilliantly spectacular. Never forget it. The best parts were before the sun actually popped over the horizon. Downright beautiful. A good view of Mt Agung too. Ask for a shore facing room. Down on the beach there's much activity. Like most beaches in Bali, there are rocks in the water so swimming is no good. However it was a memorable stay, and not too pricey.

Liked ¬∑ - Big rooms with comfortable bed and pillows. - Such a nice view from the window. - Clean and nice beach. - The restaurant in the hotel is good. - There is an ATM near from the building. - It is super easy to find taxis in front of the hotel. Disliked ¬∑ - The room furniture are old. - No hot water in the shower. - The shower area is kinda slippery. - There is some noises coming from the water going through the pipes and it can be annoying sometimes.
My best experience in Sanur. Definitely will be back for more. I SHALL RETURN!

Hotel lama yg masih lumayan bagus, areanya sangat luas seperti suatu kompleks. Kamarnya bersih namun kelihatan agak kuno, tp masih oke. Posisinya persis di pinggir pantai sanur sehingga jika ingin menikmati pantai bisa langsung keluar kamar. Kolam renangnya bagus dan terdiri dr bbrp kelompok kolam untuk anak2 maupun dewasa

The location is very good however the rooms aren't that good. The bathrooms need serious renovation. There are many many many insects including lizards in the room. The room decor is old style, which is okay however there is need of renovation in the dressing areas. The wardrobe is chipped at many places. Bathrooms don't have very good hot water and overall the lighting in the rooms is very dim. Don't go by the grand looks of the property. I was here for 3 days. At lounge, there were few ladies who were too loud with music, and didn't bother if they were disturbing others. The welcome drink needs to be collected by yourself. So, I didn't get this concept of going and asking for your welcome drink. They could have at least provided in room, if not at the reception. I have stayed for 15 days in Bali, and the welcome drink offered to you is a custom, rather than collecting yourself. Two stars are just for the ocean view and location of the hotel.

It is a nice place to stay, it has a building, cottage and second floor building. The second floor building is quite old, I stayed for two night. In my opinion, the room is very big with balcony, vintage furniture, bathroom works great but you will find it is very old and they need to change the bath tub and shower because it is yellowish. It is very nice to see the beach behind it.

Hotel dengan area yang luas sekali... Lokasi pinggir pantai pas. Ada kamar yg garden view dan ada yg sea view. Ada lapangan golfnya juga. Kalau pas dapet kamar garden view yg agak di belakang, lumayan capek juga jalannya dari lobby. Taste menu breakfast nya biasa aja, gak terlalu enak. Interior kamar udah jadul dan serem juga kalo tidurnya sendirian...

It's alright. I can't really say anything better than that. Like others have said previously, it's very much an aging hotel and I didn't see much sign of refurbishment. I stayed in the garden wing which was in nice surroundings. The room was comfortable but old and basic. The bathroom was in poor condition. Breakfast was ok, not many options and it's the same every day. The best thing about the hotel was it's location.

Lovely lovely stay!!! Every thing is quiet old fashioned which I love and the whole place has a certain charm... Old but very very clean... Beautiful friendly kind staff at every corner... Great buffet breakfast... Lots of variety. Really enjoyed every aspect of our stay here... Will be back for sure!! Thank you Inna Grand Bali Beach...

Location is the strongest point of this hotel. It has private beach, golf club, big garden. But the hotel needs major renovation. It is already old. That's why the price is cheap compared with hotels that have similar facilities. But, it's clean, and the staff is helpful.

Saya menginap di Grand Inna Bali Beach karena harus isolasi terpusat program pemerintah. Dan yang saya rasakan untuk poin-poin di bawah ini adalah: 1. Kamar: rapi, bersih, terawat walaupun vintage 2. Electricity: bekerja dengan baik kecuali bed lamp yg sebelah kanan. Kurangnya power socket 3. View: view ke pantai sanur sangat amat luar biasa (foto akan saya sertakan) 4. Pelayanan: baik 5. Sanitary: sanitary bekerja dengan baik. Tapi kalau bisa untuk faucet dan shower mixer diperbaiki agar bentuknya baik (karena yg saya dapat ini kondisinya seperti mau copot) 6. Door window: untuk pintu menuju balkon agak susah untuk dibuka maupun ditutup Jika sudah tidak pandemi, menginap di Grand Inna Bali Beach adalah sebuah rekomendasi. Btw saya di kamar 532üëçüèª
An amazing experience staying at Bali Beach ‚Äî everything was excellent, from the staff, the room, the food, and the facilities
ga jelas kamar ga dibersihkan karena alasan ga mencet tombol. ini keluarga datang sore masuk kamar sampai heran.

Sempurna untuk ketenangan. Hotel yang memiliki nilai sejarah yang tinggi. Kamar resort lengkap, kamar mandi tetap terjaga kebersihannya walaupun sudah masuk kategori lama... Mohon dipertahankan bila perlu, tingkatkan...üí™üòä ‚Ä¶

It's a very large hotel, with cottages, a garden wing with rooms in two levels and a large 'tower' wing. We stayed in a cottage, and while it was old and a bit worn, it was also clean, quiet and comfortable. It is a great place with kids, there are three pool areas and lots of beach front with lounge chairs. The restaurants are OK, but not as good as others in Sanur, so we were glad we just opted for breakfast rather than full board.

Saya menginap di Cottage yg letaknya paling selatan. Ada jasa antar-jemput gratis sampai lobby. Begitu masuk saya dan keluarga langsung disambut nyamuk yg banyak sekali, ga mungkin saya biarkan anak balita saya dikeroyok nyamuk. Akhirnya saya harus jalan jauh untuk membeli semprotan anti nyamuk. Pengalaman yg tidak enak untuk dikenang. Padahal tempatnya strategis sekali, ada akses langsung ke pantai sanur. Namun cottagenya sendiri nampak kurang terawat, waktu lepas sepatu kami menyadari klo lantainya kotor sekali. Ada juga instalasi listrik yg kendor sehingga kegeser sedikit maka lampu dan TV mati, saat digeser, timbul percik2 listrik. Deg2an takut menyambar ranjang dan menimbulkan kebakaran. Akhirnya kasur saya geser agak maju. Penerangan jalanan juga remang2 dan cenderung gelap, tidak direkomendasikan keluar cottage malam hari. Saya suka sekali dgn akses langsung ke pantai, sangat strategis untuk melihat sunrise di Bali, tp pengalaman tersebut membuat saya tidak bs merekomendasikan cottage di Grand Inna Bali Beach.

The most expensive placed we stayed in Bali. My friends and I are backpacking and decided to treat ourselves the last few days before we had home. The employees are all nice and friendly. The place is old. The rooms look nothing like the pictures neither does the beach photos. We're highly disappointed. The service tax is 21 percent in the hotel but 10 percent if you walk along the beach
Bagus sih Deket pantai dan pemandangan bagus bgt, tp utk kamar ada yg fasilitasnya kurang sprti telp tidak bisa digunakan, AC rusak, tp pihak hotel suda coba perbaiki sih

This hotel has been our family's favourite for many years. Although generally the rooms in comparison to modern standard is a tad outdated; nothing can compare to the ambiance and visual treat this mature hotel brings. Price is very good for an accommodation in front of the best beach in Sanur. Staff are very friendly and respectable. You will not find a better price for location in the area.

Sudah sering menginap di sini dari jaman kecil karena papa dan mama sering dapet complinent setiap nyepi. Apalagi event wisuda selalu dibuat di sini. Kamar bungalow nya bagus dan cukup besar. Makan pagi sangat melimpah dan beragam, makan siang apalagi, makan malam pun juga begitu. Saya menginap biasanya saat nyepi yang dapet paket komplit Brekfast lunch dinner. Jadi mantap sekali deh menginap disini.

Built in 1963, the hotel is in a reasonable state of repair, given its age and repairs and upgrades look to be ongoing. There are actually 3 sections with different reception areas - the high rise T shaped hotel, 2 storey rooms and older single storey bungalows. The WiFi is very good with each room having a repeater. Room servicing is very good. There are 5 restaurants, 3 with beach frontage - prices are not unreasonable for the setting. The pools have sections for children. The hotel is quite popular as a conference venue and also has the glass Diamond Center as a wedding venue.

Great hotel with great location. Perfect for those who are looking for tranquility and getaway. Hotel rooms are spacious and clean albeit the classic design. The Sanur beach is exactly right in front of the hotel which gives the heavenly scenery during sunrise. The rate is very affordable too!!

Saya berkunjung bukan untuk menginap tapi karena menghadiri event. Belum bisa mengulas banyak, karena tidak fulltime disini, tempat parkir yang pasti luas, toilet saat itu menurut kurang bersih, apa karena ada event dan pengunjungnya banyak atau bagaimana. Mungkin jika saya berkunjung kesini lagi, saya bisa mengulas lebih detail

When we booked from the beautiful fotos and saw the room we we're shocked! The toilet had to be flushed 6 times, only 1 plug worked for TV, kettle, hairdryer and load cell phone. The air conditioner sounded like a scooter! Their towels old. I demanded my money back or other room. Then I was happy. Beautiful gardens, friendly staff. NEVER book from photos it's deceiving!!‚òπÔ∏è

Resort nya okeee banget pinggir pantai sanur, suasana privat dan asri. Pasti balik lagi kalau ada kesempatan. Jogging track sepanjang pantai sanur. Sangat okeee! View sunrise bagusss. Banyak jajanan, dekat dengan warung makan yg terkenal di sanur.

Pelayanan sangat Bagus. Kamar Hotel yg bersih, saya suka. Kebersihan di Hotel jg bagus. Staff yg sangat ramah. Saya senang. Kolam renang jg enak, dekat dengan pantai. Saya suka.... sempet kesel sendiri krn g nyobain makanannya, krn tiap mau nyobain pasti batal krn ud terlanjur bikin appointment di tempat lain hahahaaa.... next time saya bakal kesini lagi :) Lokasi sangat strategis dan mudah akses utk kesana :) Sukses terus..... Berikut ini foto saya menunggu sunrise di pantai belakang hotel :)

Got bad experience. Pesan menggunakan ticket.com untuk kamar beach garden. Tiba di hotel tersebut, bolak balik ke lobby utama dan lobby garden. Akhirnya mao check in aja tunggu nya lama banget, karena katanya garden room nya tutup. Lah gimana thu ? Karena tunggu kelamaan, akhirnya yodah saya check in di hotel grand bali inna nya (bukan garden room). Eh sudah check in, ada aja masalahnya. Kamar nya bau apek, kamar mandi keran shower nya bermasalah. (Dibenerin donk).

Good size room. Ordered a double room but ended up a twin. They pushed the beds together. The location of the room was good for coming and going from the hotel to outside shops and restaurants. The hotel restaurant was a fair distance from the room, pool closer which worked for me. No safety deposit box which was a surprise. Comfortable, quiet stay with no issues so very happy.

One of the best hotels I have ever visited till date. The working staff are way more polite and any of your queries are answered quickly. Every corner of this place is so clean that you will think twice before littering. Take a place to stay near the beach and you will find internal peace. The ambience around is awesome. The breakfast served here is surprisingly testy. If you are in Bali, this is your place to stay !!
Great hotel with great location, despite some renovations around the hotel. Lovely staff as well..

Meski tingkat hunian kurang di masa pandemi covid 19, kebersihan cukup terjaga. Pegawai nya cukup ramah. Lokasi yg indah di pinggir pantai .. banyak aktifitas yg bisa dilakukan, mulai dari bersantai di pinggir pantai, sampai olga. Kuliner standar masa pandemi... Kalau kondisi sudah normal.. saya akan menginap disini lagi bersama keluarga ..

Salah satu hotel favorit saya, karyawan hotel baik dan ramah, tempatnya juga nyaman dan bersih, untuk area parkir mobil juga ada namun sebaiknya perlu ditambah.Breakfast hotel juga luar biasa mantap, menu yg ditawarkan bervariasi dan tiap hari berbeda. Saat pagi hari dapat melihat sun rise serta keindahan pantai sanur dari jendela kamar hotel, sangat memuaskan dan menjadi pengalaman menarik tersendiri

Kalau mau liburan bareng keluarga, hotel inj sangat cocok. Fasilitas lengkap, ke pantai tinggal jalan kaki saja soalnya pantainya mmg di brlakang hotel. Bermain anak banyak. Kolam renang beragam, dewasa dna anak anak lengkap. Tp memang hotel ini lumayan tua, jd di bbrp kamar mandi ada yg kadang saluran airmya tidak lancar. Tp secara umum ya mantap lah

This is not great place for tourists at all. 2nd day in the row there is music too loud as there is event here but the problem are lights passing our windows so we have to have close balcony all the time. I am a person with epilepsy so this can harm my health very easily. Music was mentioned but not things like that. Every day are some events so you don't really feel comfortable as a tourist. If you do a lot if activities and need quiet place don't stay in this hotel. Not for tourists but only for domestic events. Maybe price is cheap but doesn't mean you have to be in health risk. Very irresponsible management.

Pas ada teman yg nginap di Resort... Masih pagi tidak banyak terlihat tamu yg lalu lalang... Kebetulan ada pekenan.... Banyak jajanan dan minuman ala pasar kaget... Menjembatani UMKM... Terimakasih Grand Inna Bali beach...

Hotel berbintang 4 ini menawarkan total 246 kamar dengan sepuluh lantai Tower Wing termasuk Presidential Suite dan 20 Suites. Pemandangan lepas pantai sanur... Bagus untuk liburan atau acara keluarga Dan acara besar lainnya... Tempatnya terawat untuk kelas dr massa emasnya...

Hotel INNA GRAND BALI BEACH*5 yang ber-alamatkan di wilayah Jln Hangtuah Sanur, Bali ini sudah lama Tersohor, ikon Maskot Hotel Pertama Kebanggaan NKRI yang berada di Province Bali - Indonesia. Dimulai dari Riwayat Era Kemerdekaan RI di masa kepemimpin Presiden Sukarno, hingga kini di Periode masa Presiden RI yang terbaru-pun (2018) masih tetap Exist dan Jaya. Bukan hanya sekedar Hotel 5, akan tetapi Riwayat Bali & Indonesia dimasa2 yang telah lampau akan Sejarahnya ,sebagaian juga di Mulai dari sini (hingga dikelola oleh BUMN). Fasilitasnya komplittyy, Room, Cottage, Villa, Tangga-Lift & Excalator, Restaurant & Bar, Toko Souvenir, ATM, Money Changer, SPA & Sauna, Parking area, Gardener Landscape, Beach-Sand-Sea & serta Museum juga tersedia... Ditambah panorama 'SUN RiSE menjadikan Berkelas & Punya Nilai Tambah Tersendiri. Akses, sudah sangat terkenal dipenjuru antero dan walaupun kesasar mencari tempat ini tetap akan bertemu juga karena bangunan-nya cukup tinggi, apalagi jalan raya-nya juga sudah ber'Aspal & Modern. ‚àö Nilai Historical Gedung & Budaya buat Hotel perlu diLestarikan, ‚àö Service & Mutu Pelayanan Hotel juga pula di Tingkatkan, ‚àö Harga Competitive... Juga mohon Sangat untuk di Pertahan-kan Menjadi Warga Indonesia tentu-nya Merasa Bangga & Bersyukur sekali dengan Memiliki Hotel Sendiri di Negeri Tercinta ini.

Hotel lama tapi masih recomended menjadi langganan kalau menginap di daerah sanur karena harga sangat bersahabat. Kamar besar, kolam renang besar langsung akses ke pantai sanur. Terakhir menginap kamar terlihat sudah mulai usang dan perlu ditingkatkan kebersihannya. Pelayanan hotel sangat bagus, parkir luas.

Lokasi nya sekitar 1 jam di tempuh dari bandara. Cukup bagus. Berkunjung kesini gratis tanpa harus membayar tiket masuk. Pantai nya bersih ngga ada sampah nya. Meski sedikit di kunjungi oleh turis asing jika di bandingkan kuta. Tapi tempat ini sangat nyaman untuk yg suka bersantai menikamti pemandangan pantai tapi tidak begitu suka keramaian.

Salah satu Hotel tertua & tertinggi di Bali. Lokasi strategis, sangat luas. Parkir luas tp kalau ada acara nikahan disini selalu aja susah cari parkirnya. Bisa renang juga di kolamnya dengan biaya tertentu meskipun ga menginap di hotelnya
BUAT KALIAN YANG MAU PESAN HOTEL DISINI MENDING PIKIR PIKIR DULU, KARENA MINESNYA KALAU PESAN GOFOOD/DLL OJEKNYA DIRIBETIN, JADINYA GAK ADA OJEK YANG MAU AMBIL/ANTAR PESANAN KESINI

Kamarnya lumayan sih ini cuma kalau pas udah gelap agak creepy juga soalnya cukup gelap juga lokasinya. Tapi enaknya disini tuh deket pantai jadi kalau mau ke pantai tinggal jalan kaki bentar aja udah bisa lihat pantai.

lokasi strategis, di daerah wisata sanur. Parkir sangat luas (agak jauh dari loby). Masuk area loby, disambut lantunan rindik khas Bali. Loby sudah menjadi spot foto banget. Resepsionis ramah, ada di lantai 2. Toko souvenir ada di lantai 1 (area loby). Kamar nyaman, konsep klasik. View semua pantai sanur, serunya, baru bangun anda disambut sunrise... Anda bisa langsung ke pasir putih pantai sanur untuk menikmati indahnya pantai sanur, beli jagung bakar, kelapa muda, dan lumpia...

The room absolutely stank of mildew and the bathroom was pretty grimy. Make sure you bring bottled water if you‚Äôre staying here because they provide you with one bottle when you arrive and then charge you for water if you want more. Honestly this hotel was pretty run down and over-priced, only really suited to families with young children.

I had memories of my friend graduation in this place. I waited on the beach when the ceremonial on progress. There is calm beach here. The sand was rough and white, but so relaxing. I bought some spring roll at local people merchant who is so humbble. About the hotel catering, it was delicious. The toilet was clean too.

It is a retro hotel. Has not been renovated from his aging yet. Rooms are worn out, but big and comfortable Bathroom is a disaster, hot water not working, toilet not working. Room is clean, still don't give you a clean feeling. I would not come back until they renovate. Must have been a nice resort a while back. Now it is too outdated and crapy. Food is a disaster even for breakfast we walked to a nearby restaurant. The food they provided for free of charge for the rooms were a mix of international and local dishes. Sekilas tentangHotel Bali Beach, nama asal Inna Grand Bali Beach, dibangun bersama tiga hotel berbintang di tiga kota lainnya, sebuah visi pariwisata yang dirintis Presiden Sukarno dengan tujuan mengedepankan Indonesia di dunia pariwisata internasional. Empat hotel itu dibangun dari dana pampasan perang pemerintah Jepang. Yuke Ardhiati dalam buku Bung Karno Sang Arsitek (2004) menuliskan, sebelum munculnya peristiwa Dekrit Presiden 1959, di tahun 1958 Sukarno telah berhasil merintis lobi dengan pemerintah Jepang dalam upaya pengembalian dana pampasan perang. Akhirnya terwujud Pakta Perjanjian bahwa Jepang akan membayar US$223 juta selama 12 tahun, akan menghapuskan utang niaga Indonesia sebesar hampir US$177 juta, dan akan memberikan bantuan ekonomi sebesar US$400 juta. Sedangkan program-program pampasan yang berkaitan dengan pembangunan arsitektural ditemukan dalam sejumlah proyek arsitektur, antara lain Hotel Indonesia (Jakarta), Hotel Bali Beach (Bali), Tonichi Hotel Ambarrukmo (Yogyakarta), Tonichi Samudra Beach Hotel (Jawa Barat), dan Tonichi Gedung Wisma Nusantara (Jakarta). Semua dibangun perusahaan konstruksi Jepang. Kutip Sarasvati 2017
